Title: The Rooster Prince
Writer: Noah Hawley, Noah Hawley (created for television by)
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Allison Tolman, Colin Hanks, Martin Freeman
Plot: Molly begins to suspect that Lester is involved in the murders, but her boss points her in a different direction. Meanwhile, Malvo investigates the plot against a man known as the Supermarket King.
